fields.name: A. Point of service
fields.description: Systems that facilitate the provision and delivery of healthcare services to health service users at the point of care. They include software capabilities that enable healthcare providers to access, record and update health service users' health information as well as interactively communicate with them.
fields.description_en: Systems that facilitate the provision and delivery of healthcare services to health service users at the point of care. They include software capabilities that enable healthcare providers to access, record and update health service users' health information as well as interactively communicate with them.

fields.name: B. Health System/Provider administration
fields.description: Systems that provide capabilities that facilitate the administrative and clinical management aspects of health systems. They provide software capabilities or services to healthcare that may be leveraged by other applications across the digital health enterprise.
fields.description_en: Systems that provide capabilities that facilitate the administrative and clinical management aspects of health systems. They provide software capabilities or services to healthcare that may be leveraged by other applications across the digital health enterprise.

fields.name: C. Registries & Directories
fields.description: Systems that serve as a central authority for maintaining specific sets of data. They provide software capabilities or services that are canonical/master lists, which are enforced by specific governance mechanisms.
fields.description_en: Systems that serve as a central authority for maintaining specific sets of data. They provide software capabilities or services that are canonical/master lists, which are enforced by specific governance mechanisms.

fields.name: D. Data Management services
fields.description: Systems that serve as a repository containing data that has been validated. They provide capabilities to store, process, retrieve and analyse data held within such systems.
fields.description_en: Systems that serve as a repository containing data that has been validated. They provide capabilities to store, process, retrieve and analyse data held within such systems.

fields.name: E. Surveillance and Response
fields.description: Systems that support the continuous, systematic collection, analysis and interpretation of data for use in health contexts. They provide software capabilities that utilise protocols to generate information.
fields.description_en: Systems that support the continuous, systematic collection, analysis and interpretation of data for use in health contexts. They provide software capabilities that utilise protocols to generate information.

fields.name: A1: Communication systems
fields.description:
Systems that are used to transfer electronic information. Messages can be exchanged between healthcare providers or between healthcare providers and health service users.

Other descriptors:
Health service user (Client) communication
Hospital communication system
Clinical/ Medical communication
Care communications

Functional areas include:
Referrals
Emergency alert and notifications
Provider-to-health service user communication
Provider-to-provider communication/ Healthcare worker collaboration
fields.description_en:
Systems that are used to transfer electronic information. Messages can be exchanged between healthcare providers or between healthcare providers and health service users.

Other descriptors:
Health service user (Client) communication
Hospital communication system
Clinical/ Medical communication
Care communications

Functional areas include:
Referrals
Emergency alert and notifications
Provider-to-health service user communication
Provider-to-provider communication/ Healthcare worker collaboration

fields.name: A2: Community-based information systems
fields.description:
Applications that facilitate data collection and use at the community level. These applications are utilised by communitybased workers who provide health promotion and disease prevention activities.

Functional areas include: Patient management
Tasking
Decision support
Community communication
fields.description_en:
Applications that facilitate data collection and use at the community level. These applications are utilised by communitybased workers who provide health promotion and disease prevention activities.

Functional areas include: Patient management
Tasking
Decision support
Community communication

fields.name: A3: Decision support systems
fields.description:
"Computer based tools which combine medical information databases and algorithms with patient specific data. They are intended to provide healthcare professionals and/or users with recommendations for diagnosis, prognosis, monitoring and treatment of individual patients."

Other descriptors:
AI for clinical decision support
Clinical decision support
fields.description_en:
"Computer based tools which combine medical information databases and algorithms with patient specific data. They are intended to provide healthcare professionals and/or users with recommendations for diagnosis, prognosis, monitoring and treatment of individual patients."

Other descriptors:
AI for clinical decision support
Clinical decision support

fields.name: A4: Diagnostics information systems
fields.description:
Other descriptors:
Diagnostic applications found in devices (Software in a medical device)
Wearables that collect health data generated by the user
Software as a medical device
Radiology information systems
Medical imaging systems
Picture archiving and communication system (PACS)
fields.description_en:
Other descriptors:
Diagnostic applications found in devices (Software in a medical device)
Wearables that collect health data generated by the user
Software as a medical device
Radiology information systems
Medical imaging systems
Picture archiving and communication system (PACS)

fields.name: A5: Electronic medical record systems
fields.description:
A secure, online system that holds information about people's health and clinical care and is managed by healthcare providers.

Other descriptors:
Electronic health record

Functional areas include:
Clinical decision support
Record management
Health service user registration
fields.description_en:
A secure, online system that holds information about people's health and clinical care and is managed by healthcare providers.

Other descriptors:
Electronic health record

Functional areas include:
Clinical decision support
Record management
Health service user registration

fields.name: A6: Laboratory information systems
fields.description:
"Systems that support the process from patient sample to patient result."

Other descriptors:
Laboratory information management system (LIMS)

Functional areas include:
Lab requests/ test ordering
Sample tracking
Sample processing
Results reporting
fields.description_en:
"Systems that support the process from patient sample to patient result."

Other descriptors:
Laboratory information management system (LIMS)

Functional areas include:
Lab requests/ test ordering
Sample tracking
Sample processing
Results reporting

fields.name: A7: Personal health records
fields.description:
Digital personal health record is a record of an individual’s health information in a structured digital format for a set of defined use cases over which the health service user has agency.

Other descriptors:
Patient portals

Functional areas include:
Appointment booking and cancellations
Appointment reminders and summaries
Prescription list
Secure messaging to providers
Test results
fields.description_en:
Digital personal health record is a record of an individual’s health information in a structured digital format for a set of defined use cases over which the health service user has agency.

Other descriptors:
Patient portals

Functional areas include:
Appointment booking and cancellations
Appointment reminders and summaries
Prescription list
Secure messaging to providers
Test results

fields.name: A8: Pharmacy information systems
fields.description:
Other descriptors:
Medication information

Functional areas include:
Dispensing
Drug interaction monitoring
Decision support
Medicines inventory management
Medicines administration
Electronic prescribing
fields.description_en:
Other descriptors:
Medication information

Functional areas include:
Dispensing
Drug interaction monitoring
Decision support
Medicines inventory management
Medicines administration
Electronic prescribing

fields.name: A9: Telehealth systems
fields.description:
“Electronic information and telecommunication technologies that support long-distance clinical health care, patient and professional health-related education, public health and health administration.”
"They are intended to allow monitoring and/or delivery of healthcare to patients at locations remote from where the healthcare professional is located."

Other descriptors:
Telemedicine systems
Virtual health and care
Tele-expertise
Tele-triage

Functional areas include:
Store and forward
Interactive services
Remote patient (or health service user) monitoring Teleconsultation
Guided self help
fields.description_en:
“Electronic information and telecommunication technologies that support long-distance clinical health care, patient and professional health-related education, public health and health administration.”
"They are intended to allow monitoring and/or delivery of healthcare to patients at locations remote from where the healthcare professional is located."

Other descriptors:
Telemedicine systems
Virtual health and care
Tele-expertise
Tele-triage

Functional areas include:
Store and forward
Interactive services
Remote patient (or health service user) monitoring Teleconsultation
Guided self help

fields.name: B1: Blood bank information management systems
fields.name_en: B1: Blood bank information management systems
fields.description:
Other descriptors: Blood bank software

Functional areas include:
Lab test management
Patient management
Blood components management
Donor test results management
Adverse reaction data management
fields.description_en:
Other descriptors: Blood bank software

Functional areas include:
Lab test management
Patient management
Blood components management
Donor test results management
Adverse reaction data management

fields.name: B2: Health finance-related information systems
fields.description:
"Stores, categorizes and facilitates the administration of centralised claims and finance related data to care provision to patients within the health information exchange (HIE). The service receives claims/financial data from Point of Service (PoS) applications (including financing applications acting as a point of service interface outside of other PoS systems) and curates the management of them."

Other descriptors:
Integrated financial management information system
Public financial management information systems
Health coverage schemes information management systems
Health insurance information system
Social protection scheme management
Claims management system
Budget systems

Functional areas include:
Health accounts
Facility financial management
Revenue and expenditure management
Claims management
fields.description_en:
"Stores, categorizes and facilitates the administration of centralised claims and finance related data to care provision to patients within the health information exchange (HIE). The service receives claims/financial data from Point of Service (PoS) applications (including financing applications acting as a point of service interface outside of other PoS systems) and curates the management of them."

Other descriptors:
Integrated financial management information system
Public financial management information systems
Health coverage schemes information management systems
Health insurance information system
Social protection scheme management
Claims management system
Budget systems

Functional areas include:
Health accounts
Facility financial management
Revenue and expenditure management
Claims management

fields.name: B3: Health program monitoring systems
fields.description:
Other descriptors:
Delivery monitoring
Health program forecasting
fields.description_en:
Other descriptors:
Delivery monitoring
Health program forecasting

fields.name: B4: Human resource information systems
fields.description: Systems that supply health system/ resource leaders with information to track, manage and plan the health workforce.
fields.description_en: Systems that supply health system/ resource leaders with information to track, manage and plan the health workforce.

fields.name: B5: Learning and training systems
fields.description:
Other descriptors:
e-learning platform
Medical simulation software
Case log systems

Functional areas include:
continuing professional development (CPD) / continuing
medical education (CME) tracking
fields.description_en:
Other descriptors:
e-learning platform
Medical simulation software
Case log systems

Functional areas include:
continuing professional development (CPD) / continuing
medical education (CME) tracking

fields.name: B6: Logistics management information systems (LMIS)
fields.description:
Systems that store and aggregate routine supply chain data and facilitates its analysis for improving supply chain management. They play a central role in enabling commodity visibility and operational management of a wide-area supply chain operation.

Other descriptors:
Supply chain management system

Functional areas include:
Stock forecasting
Cold chain monitoring
Order management
Warehouse management
Inventory management
fields.description_en:
Systems that store and aggregate routine supply chain data and facilitates its analysis for improving supply chain management. They play a central role in enabling commodity visibility and operational management of a wide-area supply chain operation.

Other descriptors:
Supply chain management system

Functional areas include:
Stock forecasting
Cold chain monitoring
Order management
Warehouse management
Inventory management

fields.name: B7: Patient Administration systems
fields.description:
Functional areas include:
Admissions-Discharge-Transfer (ADT)
Patient care tracking
Bed occupancy status
Admissions management
Appointments management
fields.description_en:
Functional areas include:
Admissions-Discharge-Transfer (ADT)
Patient care tracking
Bed occupancy status
Admissions management
Appointments management

fields.name: B8: Research information systems
fields.description:
Other descriptors:
Clinical trial management software (CTMS)
Electronic lab notebook
fields.description_en:
Other descriptors:
Clinical trial management software (CTMS)
Electronic lab notebook

fields.name: C1: Census and population information systems
fields.name_en: C1: Census and population information systems
fields.description:
Digital systems that systematically record information about members of a population.

Other descriptors:
National ID systems
Population register
fields.description_en:
Digital systems that systematically record information about members of a population.

Other descriptors:
National ID systems
Population register

fields.name: C2: Civil registration and vital statistics (CRVS) systems
fields.name_en: C2: Civil registration and vital statistics (CRVS) systems
fields.description:
"Registers all births and deaths, issues birth and death certificates, and compiles and disseminates vital statistics, including cause of death information. It may also record marriages and divorces."

Functional areas include:
Birth registration and certificates
Death registration and certificates
Cause of death assignment/selection tool
Verbal autopsy tool
fields.description_en:
"Registers all births and deaths, issues birth and death certificates, and compiles and disseminates vital statistics, including cause of death information. It may also record marriages and divorces."

Functional areas include:
Birth registration and certificates
Death registration and certificates
Cause of death assignment/selection tool
Verbal autopsy tool

fields.name: C3: Facility management information systems
fields.description:
Functional areas include:
Facility based performance management
Asset management
Facility registration
Accounts receivable
fields.description_en:
Functional areas include:
Facility based performance management
Asset management
Facility registration
Accounts receivable

fields.name: C4: (Health) Facility registries
fields.description:
A central authority to uniquely identify all places where health services are administered within a country.

Other descriptors:
Facility directory
fields.description_en:
A central authority to uniquely identify all places where health services are administered within a country.

Other descriptors:
Facility directory

fields.name: C5: Health worker registry
fields.description:
Central authority for maintaining the unique identities of healthcare providers within a country.

Other descriptors:
Human resource information systems
fields.description_en:
Central authority for maintaining the unique identities of healthcare providers within a country.

Other descriptors:
Human resource information systems

fields.name: C6: Identification registries and directories
fields.description: Systems that serve as a central authority for maintaining unique identifiable data of citizens in a population. They provide proof of legal identity and “enable a person to prove who they are, using credentials recognised by law.
fields.description_en: Systems that serve as a central authority for maintaining unique identifiable data of citizens in a population. They provide proof of legal identity and “enable a person to prove who they are, using credentials recognised by law.

fields.name: C7: Immunisation information systems
fields.description:
“Confidential, population-based, computerized databases that record all immunization doses administered by participating providers to persons residing within a given geopolitical area.”

Other descriptors:
Electronic immunisation registry
Immunisation records
Vaccination records

Functional areas include:
Immunisation status monitoring
Reminder/ recall notification
Immunisation record generation
fields.description_en:
“Confidential, population-based, computerized databases that record all immunization doses administered by participating providers to persons residing within a given geopolitical area.”

Other descriptors:
Electronic immunisation registry
Immunisation records
Vaccination records

Functional areas include:
Immunisation status monitoring
Reminder/ recall notification
Immunisation record generation

fields.name: C8: Master patient index
fields.description:
Manages the unique identity of individuals receiving health services within a country.

Other descriptors:
Client (Health service user) registry
Patient registry
fields.description_en:
Manages the unique identity of individuals receiving health services within a country.

Other descriptors:
Client (Health service user) registry
Patient registry

fields.name: C9: Product catalogues
fields.description:
The central authority for defining products, such as health and medical commodities, and their categorization.

Other descriptors:
Product registry
fields.description_en:
The central authority for defining products, such as health and medical commodities, and their categorization.

Other descriptors:
Product registry

fields.name: C10: Public Key directories
fields.description: Central repository for exchanging the information required to authenticate electronic machine-readable documents including health certificates.
fields.description_en: Central repository for exchanging the information required to authenticate electronic machine-readable documents including health certificates.

fields.name: C11: Terminology and classification systems
fields.description:
A central authority to uniquely identify the clinical activities that occur within the care delivery process by maintaining a terminology set mapped to international standards such as ICD10, LOINC, SNOMED and others.

Other descriptors:
Clinical terminology
Terminology service
Terminology management service
Terminology coding/ mapping tool
fields.description_en:
A central authority to uniquely identify the clinical activities that occur within the care delivery process by maintaining a terminology set mapped to international standards such as ICD10, LOINC, SNOMED and others.

Other descriptors:
Clinical terminology
Terminology service
Terminology management service
Terminology coding/ mapping tool

fields.name: D1: Analytics systems
fields.description:
“Systems that examine and process the information outputs produced by middleware.” They are data tools that are used to facilitate decision making.

Other descriptors:
Predictive analytics
Prescriptive data analytics
Diagnostic data analytics
Descriptive data analytics

Functional areas include:
Data visualization
Dashboards
Business intelligence
Clinical data dashboards
fields.description_en:
“Systems that examine and process the information outputs produced by middleware.” They are data tools that are used to facilitate decision making.

Other descriptors:
Predictive analytics
Prescriptive data analytics
Diagnostic data analytics
Descriptive data analytics

Functional areas include:
Data visualization
Dashboards
Business intelligence
Clinical data dashboards

fields.name: D2: Data interchange and interoperability
fields.description:
Provides software capabilities to support managed data exchange and interoperability between applications and services across the digital health enterprise.

Other descriptors:
Interoperability layer
Health information exchange

Functional areas include:
Authentication
Entity matching service
fields.description_en:
Provides software capabilities to support managed data exchange and interoperability between applications and services across the digital health enterprise.

Other descriptors:
Interoperability layer
Health information exchange

Functional areas include:
Authentication
Entity matching service

fields.name: D3: Data warehouses
fields.description:
"An enterprise system used for the analysis and reporting of structured and semi-structured data from multiple sources."

Other descriptors:
Repositories
Data storage 
National Data Repository

Functional areas include:
Data processing (extract, transform, load - ETL)
Data consolidation
Data cleaning
Reporting
fields.description_en:
"An enterprise system used for the analysis and reporting of structured and semi-structured data from multiple sources."

Other descriptors:
Repositories
Data storage 
National Data Repository

Functional areas include:
Data processing (extract, transform, load - ETL)
Data consolidation
Data cleaning
Reporting

fields.name: D4: Environmental monitoring systems
fields.description:
“Environmental management information systems (EMIS) are organizational-technical systems for systematically obtaining, processing, and making available relevant environmental information.”

Other descriptors:
Environmental management information systems (EMIS)
fields.description_en:
“Environmental management information systems (EMIS) are organizational-technical systems for systematically obtaining, processing, and making available relevant environmental information.”

Other descriptors:
Environmental management information systems (EMIS)

fields.name: D5: Geographic information systems (GIS)
fields.description:
"Computer system that analyses and displays geographically referenced information."

Functional areas include:
Display of spatial relationships
fields.description_en:
"Computer system that analyses and displays geographically referenced information."

Functional areas include:
Display of spatial relationships

fields.name: D6: Health Management Information systems (HMIS)
fields.description:
Stores routinely collected aggregate healthcare data and facilitates their analysis, with the goal of improving the quality of health services.

Other descriptors:
Hospital information systems
Clinic information systems

Functional areas include:
Analytics
Performance management
fields.description_en:
Stores routinely collected aggregate healthcare data and facilitates their analysis, with the goal of improving the quality of health services.

Other descriptors:
Hospital information systems
Clinic information systems

Functional areas include:
Analytics
Performance management

fields.name: D7: Knowledge management systems
fields.description:
Systems that facilitate the creation and utilisation of knowledge. "They are databases containing inference rules and information relating to expert knowledge in a special field."

Other descriptors:
eLearning system
Knowledge base software
Content management software
fields.description_en:
Systems that facilitate the creation and utilisation of knowledge. "They are databases containing inference rules and information relating to expert knowledge in a special field."

Other descriptors:
eLearning system
Knowledge base software
Content management software

fields.name: D8: Shared Health Record and Health Information Repository
fields.name_en: D8: Shared Health Record and Health Information Repository
fields.description:
A repository containing the normalized version of content created within the community, after being validated against other registries (i.e., health worker registries, facility registries, client/health service user registries). It is a collection of personcentric records for patients with information in the exchange.

Other descriptors:
Longitudinal health records
National health domain-specific registries
Clinical data repository
Clinical data warehouse
fields.description_en:
A repository containing the normalized version of content created within the community, after being validated against other registries (i.e., health worker registries, facility registries, client/health service user registries). It is a collection of personcentric records for patients with information in the exchange.

Other descriptors:
Longitudinal health records
National health domain-specific registries
Clinical data repository
Clinical data warehouse

fields.name: E1: Emergency preparedness and response systems
fields.name_en: E1: Emergency preparedness and response systems
fields.description:
"Systems that support the management of knowledge and capacities to effectively anticipate, respond to and recover from the impacts of likely, imminent or current disasters."

Other descriptors:
Early warning system

Functional areas include:
Contact tracing
Track and trace
Case reporting
Case investigation
fields.description_en:
"Systems that support the management of knowledge and capacities to effectively anticipate, respond to and recover from the impacts of likely, imminent or current disasters."

Other descriptors:
Early warning system

Functional areas include:
Contact tracing
Track and trace
Case reporting
Case investigation

fields.name: E2: Public health and disease surveillance systems
fields.name_en: E2: Public health and disease surveillance systems
fields.description:
Other descriptors:
Disease registries
Infection surveillance
Community based surveillance
One-health surveillance
Public health indicator reporting

Functional areas include:
Case reporting
Vaccine-related adverse events monitoring
Social media monitoring
fields.description_en:
Other descriptors:
Disease registries
Infection surveillance
Community based surveillance
One-health surveillance
Public health indicator reporting

Functional areas include:
Case reporting
Vaccine-related adverse events monitoring
Social media monitoring
